Pricing Table

Our Membership Plans

  • $10/Day

    One Day Training
    • One day access to all clubs
    • Training in group
    • No Dedicated trainer
    • Access to one 1 hour fitness class
    • No access to spa center
      (Book Separately)

  • $49/month

    One Year Subscription
    • Access to all clubs
    • Training in group or alone
    • Dedicated trainer available
    • Access to one 1 hour fitness class
    • Access to spa center
      (Book Separately)

  • $65/month

    One Year Subscription
    • Access to all clubs
    • Training in group or alone
    • Dedicated trainer available
    • Access to one all fitness class
    • Access to spa center
      (Book Separately)
